entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
